short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Benefit from the full SightCall VISION experience through this extension for a desktop console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables easy access to the premier visual assistance platform that turns a customer’s desktop computer into a problem-solving detective. Users of the extension have the visual context needed to see, analyze, guide, and report through a customer’s experience.  

During a customer interaction, the SightCall VISION extension allows for visual assistance meetings with features such as:  
- Video Recording 
- Geolocation 
- Front/back camera control 
- OCR reader 
- Take snapshot 
- AR annotations 
- Live pointer 
- Freeze image 
- Media sharing 
- Live chat 
- Control zoom 
- Multiparty interactions 
- Screensharing 
- Share media (from gallery/endpoint)  
- Barcode scanner 
- Image editor
